definitions.definition: To shock a person, thing, individual, or animal with a handheld device with the electric shock that it delivers; to stun with a stun gun .
To strike verbally or gesturally with ill intents.
examples: As I spoke too loudly during the solemn church service, my husband shot me a glance that emotionally tasered me to the point of silence until we returned home 2 hours later.

main_definition: To shock a person, thing, individual, or animal with a handheld device with the electric shock that it delivers; to stun with a stun gun .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) To strike verbally or gesturally with ill intents.
